HERO.TITLE: Hi, I'm Yago! üëã
HERO.DESCRIPTION: I am a higher education student in web development with practical experience in developing web applications using technologies like Angular and Node.js. During my studies, I have worked with tools like PostgreSQL and MySQL. Although I am in the early stages of my career, I am deeply passionate about web development and enjoy every opportunity to learn and grow in this field.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.ABOUT_TEXT: I am a passionate web developer with experience in various technologies. I enjoy facing challenges and improving my skills day by day.
ABOUT.ADDITIONAL: I have worked on several projects where I have been able to develop both technical and personal skills. Some of my most notable skills are:

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Here you can talk with me or follow me:

VITALY.DESCRIPTION: As part of a development team, I contributed to the maintenance and implementation of improvements in back-end logic as well as responsive optimizations on the front-end, ensuring solid performance and a seamless user experience across devices. I also developed and deployed a complete CRM, managing the entire project lifecycle from conception to production. Additionally, I worked on API documentation using Swagger to facilitate understanding and integration, and implemented persistent improvements in the database to ensure efficiency and scalability.

VKS.DESCRIPTION: I designed and developed a website for an esports team from Extremadura. I led the ideation of user-facing interactivity, created the full visual design in Figma, and built the site solo with Angular 20, preparing it for future server deployment. I also built a secondary page for AEXVES that links to the interactive site, aligning with the main site's design and implementing it in WIX for later publication.

WORK.TITLE: Work
WORK.DESCRIPTION: These are some of the projects I have built:

SUBTITLER.TITLE: Subtitler: Live
SUBTITLER.DESCRIPTION: This web application allows you to capture screen audio in real time and transcribe it using Amazon Transcribe. Developed with JavaScript and Amazon Transcribe.

WISHLIST.TITLE: Wishlist
WISHLIST.DESCRIPTION: Responsive wishlist website with filters made using Angular and Bootstrap.

MAZAOGYM.TITLE: MazaoGym
MAZAOGYM.DESCRIPTION: Gym project completed for the end of one of the first-year DAW courses using PHP.

DUNGEON.TITLE: Dungeon game in Java
DUNGEON.DESCRIPTION: Dungeon game programmed in Java using JavaFX. End-of-course programming project.

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: CatanduYago.github.io
PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION: This is my Github pages repository where I deploy most of my apps.

VKS.TITLE: Valkiria's Vikings
VKS.DESCRIPTION: This website was designed and developed by me as part of a project for the esports team from Extremadura, Valkiria's Vikings. It has not yet been published due to reasons beyond development.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skills
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: These are some of the skills I have acquired during my career:

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: Testimonials
TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION: People that talk great about me:

BORJA.TEXT: "An exceptional teammate, a web development student with great talent. Always attentive and with an incredible ability to grasp even the most complex concepts. His skill in solving technical problems is impressive, and his dedication makes him a key asset in any team. Intelligent, proactive, and with a positive attitude. Highly recommended!"
